title: [Security] load()未限制文件大小，可能导致内存耗尽（DoS）
summary: The fix for this issue has already been implemented in the codebase. The TodoStorage.load() method now includes a 10MB file size limit check that raises ValueError when files exceed this threshold, preventing DoS attacks.

ruff_commands: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/storage.py tests/test_minimal_framework.py
verification.notes: All existing tests pass. The fix is already in src/flywheel/storage.py (lines 25-33).

existing_implementation.commit: 10fa25d fix: add 10MB JSON file size limit to prevent DoS attacks
